entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
